snippet.title: Adabana Odd Tales Trailer
snippet.description:
Journey to the realm of illustrated book with "Adabana Odd Tales" available now on Steam! 

For a limited time only from June 18 to June 25, get 10% off of “Adabana Odd Tales“ plus an additional 10% off when you purchase it with “ATRI -My Dear Moments-” as a bundle!

Buy now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1094820/Adabana_Odd_Tales/

About Adabana Odd Tales:
Immerse yourself in the land of fairy tales. This fantastical realm, where folklore and fantasy reign, is named the Land of Adabana—an ethereal world as fleeting as dreams. Follow Shirohime, a girl dressed in pure white awoke in a forest, deprived of knowledge and memories of who she was. Kurofude, a boy wielding a black brush, is familiar with her and accompanies her through the realm of Adabana.

Web: https://adabanaitan.com/en/
